short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Timer for keeping meetings on track.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this simple agenda tracker, you can plan and timebox your meeting topics with it's timer. 

You can extend and/or skip your agenda items, and it warns 10 seconds before countdown ends.
